title: Provisional Series
body:
So in season 4 I went blindly into ranked even though I was horrible at the game, and got 2 out of 10 wins, ending up in Bronze 3. I kept playing ranked thinking I would get better, and fell to Bronze 4. So I stopped ranked for about 6 months.

I recently tried my provisionals again, now that I have a better understanding of the game I managed 6 out of 10 wins, but I ended up in Bronze 4...

Is there some sort of calculation I missed?

replies.body: How do you place lower than GoldV in promotion games, so awful.
I'm currently going 2-2 for now :) Wish me luck in my next 6 games :D

its based on your previous season ranking.
plus it went down for everyone.

the old system the reset made you move towards 1200 MMR (silver 4) but they removed that. so with the old system a 6-4 bronze 4 would have moved up...not anymore. hell, there were 10-0 who went DOWN this season...thats how %%%%ed the system is.

none at all, MMR doesnt decay in bronze. 

Youll have to climb out good sir
